text: Salma, the father of Bethlehem, and Hareph, the father of Bethgader.
descendants of Bakbuk, descendants of Hakupha, descendants of Harhur,
â€œRemember the deeds that our ancestors did in their times, and you shall win great honor and an everlasting name.
He went down with them and came to Nazareth, and was obedient to them; and his mother kept all these things in her heart.
